item.description: Greg and Jeff are planning on handing out literature and invitations to the Boston Tea Party and Freedom Rally after work in Copley Square. Meet at Jeff's place (130 Newbury St #2 between Claredon and Dartmouth), and from there they'll head over to Copley for distribution and a sign wave. If you're interested in attending and can't be there by 5:30 just take the T to Copley on the Green line and they'll likely be standing within 100 feet of the T enterance. Jeff's number is 203-767-3514.
item.name: Literature / Invitation Distribution at Copley Square
